name: Bloodbath
description: '''Bloodbath''' is a Swedish [[death metal]] [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] from [[Stockholm]], formed in 1998. The band has released six full-length albums, two EPs and two DVDs depicting their performances at [[Wacken Open Air]] (in 2005) and [[Bloodstock Open Air]] (in 2010). The group consists of [[Martin Axenrot]] (ex-[[Opeth]]), [[Anders Nystr√∂m]] (ex-[[Katatonia]]) and [[Nick Holmes (singer)|Nick Holmes]] ([[Paradise Lost (band)|Paradise Lost]]).
